AI Description: ndiff is a command-line tool for comparing two Nmap XML output files. It parses the XML files and identifies the differences in the scan results, including changes in host status, open ports, service versions, and other scan details.
Core Features: Compare Two Nmap Xml Output Files, Identify The Differences In Host Status, Open Ports, Service Versions, & Scan Details, Generate A Report Highlighting The Variances Between The Scans
General Tags: Network Security, Network Monitoring, Penetration Testing, Cybersecurity
